articles.description: Will the EcoSport’s revised pricing put it in a better position to take on the likes of the Kia Sonet and Nissan Magnite?     Ford has slashed the EcoSport’s prices by up to Rs 39,000.    The Titanium variant now gets a sunroof that was earlier reserved for t…
articles.content:
• Ford has slashed the EcoSports prices by up to Rs 39,000.
  • The Titanium variant now gets a sunroof that was earlier reserved for the top-spec Sports and Titanium+ variants.

articles.title: BEML’s stock fires up as strategic disinvestment gets government nod - Mint
articles.description: BEML’s strength lies in rail and metro projects, defence, and mining and construction, which are seeing increased order flows. Metro rail is seeing revenue bookings from major rail projects such as Mumbai and Bengaluru
articles.content: The government's approval to sell 26% stake in BEML Ltd through strategic disinvestment has fired up the stock. The company's share price shot up over 4% in early trade on Monday. The stock is tradin… [+2120 chars]

articles.title: Gold prices today surge over ₹1,000 per 10 gram to 2-month high, silver jumps - Mint
articles.description: Gold prices in India had been trading in a very narrow range over the past two weeks.Fresh decline in US real yields and a weak US dollar lifted gold prices
